name: Jotty
short_description: Lightweight checklists and notes app with Markdown support, Kanban boards, and file-based storage.
description: Lightweight checklists and notes app with Markdown support, Kanban boards, and file-based storage. Jotty is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, utility, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Jotty on your home server to lightweight checklists and notes app with markdown support, kanban boards, and file-based storage without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Jotty to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
